review_content: Bubbly gold pour. Thin foam. Hops and yeast..sweet wheat flavor with a sweet wheat and hop finish. Medium carbonated. Not heavy at all.

Tall boy @ Foodmaxx Harrisonburg VA: Rice nose, fingernail polish on the edges. Crystal clear yellow, medium head, minimal retention, some lace. Very little flavor, cane sugar, rice. Light body, easy carbonation.
Very light, transluscent, watery and appley.  Egads. Really not good at all, this one.

Neus: graan, brood
Uiterlijk: helder gouden bier met ruime witte schuimkraag
Smaak: licht bitterig
Licht mondgevoel
Dorstlessend biertje indien fris gedronken.
Honestly, for a light beer made for mass market, it's way better than most of them of the same kind... Miller, Bud, kronenbourg, etc are far behind in my opinion... A refreshing lager when thirsty 🙂

33cl bottle. The marketing for this is trying to be American as hard as it possibly can. Light gold pour, white head. aroma is "cold", haha, no i mean it is pretty aromaless, some "ginger" type note and metal/ malted beverage. Flavor is slightly tart, very similiar to miller lite, metallic, rootbeerish, not great.
Can 500ml (in Jeju). Pale golden colour, small white head. Neutral corny aroma. Light-bodied. Watery and fizzy. Only hints on corn, citrus and rubber. Harmless as it doesn't taste much of anything.
Pale colour. Very light taste, quite watery. Typical Korean commercial lager. Not for beer afficionados.
industrial smell, piss clear with no head. taste is soda water, hard carbonation. not good, but lacking the gross corniness of cass regular. it's about 0.1pts above cass.

Pours a clear straw yellow on tap with bubbly white head that dissipates to leave light lace. Aroma and taste of a light adjunct rice lager, crisp and refreshing, but unexciting. Clean but bland, ooh yeah.
Bottle in Seoul. Fresh smooth watery beginning. Malty smooth, mild watery, very watery. Intense mild, no aroma, no depth, no bitterness. Very bad.
(can) clear pale yellow colour with a medium tall white head; aroma of skunk, rubber; neutral, barely present flavour, no finish

Aroma: No

Appearance: Quite little head, clean gold colour

Taste: Salty, hazy sweet of malts, no hop-bitter

Palate: Light body, thin texture, fizzy carbonation and little flat sweet finish of malts

Overall: Disappointed, just like sparkling water.
It’s a typical light lager. Pale yellow pour, bitterless and watery taste, very thin body like water, very very very pale flavor of malts and citrus, head disappears quickly.
Can. I had this on a KAL flight from ATL to ICN. The stewardess said it was one of her favorites. I feel sad for her. It tastes like lost hope turpentine.

Aroma: No…

A golden lager with a thin white head. In aroma, grassy malt with mineral notes, light off notes, light solvent, bad. In mouth, light watery lager with no hops, sweetish, bad. Can from 7 11 next to my hotel. 1800 wons.
330ml Dose. Hellgelbe Farbe mit sehr wenig Schaum. Geruch schwach malzig, muffig. Geschmack extrem wässrig malzig.
Can from a random 7-11 in Seoul. Nose has a vague whiff of lager elements to it, but it really is super light as the name would imply. Taste is damn near water. Completely forgettable.
